home.title: AITuber Flow
home.subtitle: Visual Workflow Editor
home.serverError: Make sure the backend server is running at http://localhost:8001
home.templatesDesc: Start quickly with a pre-built workflow
home.noWorkflowsDesc: Create your first workflow or start from a template above

logs.title: Execution Log
logs.empty: No logs yet. Run the workflow to see execution logs.

nodeDescription.start:
Workflow entry point.
[Usage] Processing starts from here. Connect to the next node.
nodeDescription.end:
Workflow exit point.
[Usage] Place at the end of processing. Receives input and completes the workflow.
nodeDescription.loop:
Loop node that repeats processing.
[Usage] Set the repeat count in config. Connect nodes to repeat to the body output.
nodeDescription.foreach:
Node that iterates over each element in an array.
[Usage] Connect array to input. Current element is output to item.
nodeDescription.youtube-chat:
Input node for YouTube Live comments.
[Usage] Set Video ID in config. Outputs message and author when comments arrive.
nodeDescription.twitch-chat:
Input node for Twitch chat.
[Usage] Set channel name in config. Outputs message and author when chats arrive.
nodeDescription.manual-input:
Manual text input node.
[Usage] Enter text at runtime. Useful for testing and debugging.
nodeDescription.openai-llm:
LLM node using OpenAI API.
[Usage] Connect prompt input. Set model and system prompt in config.
nodeDescription.voicevox-tts:
TTS node using VOICEVOX.
[Usage] Connect text to read. Select speaker in config. *Requires VOICEVOX running.
nodeDescription.console-output:
Debug node for console output.
[Usage] Connect any data. Output appears in the console at the bottom.
nodeDescription.switch:
Conditional branching node.
[Usage] Connect value to check. Set conditions in config. Branches to true/false.
nodeDescription.delay:
Delay node.
[Usage] Connect input. Set delay time (ms) in config. Used for timing adjustments.
nodeDescription.http-request:
HTTP request node.
[Usage] Set URL, method, headers in config. Response is output to response.
nodeDescription.text-transform:
Text transformation node.
[Usage] Connect input to text. Set template in config. Use {{text}} to reference input.
nodeDescription.random:
Random value generator.
[Usage] Set range or options in config. Different value output to value each time.
nodeDescription.timer:
Auto-trigger timer node.
[Usage] Set interval (ms) in config. Connect to processes for periodic execution.
nodeDescription.variable:
Variable storage node.
[Usage] Set variable name in config. Use set to save, get to retrieve. Share values in workflow.
nodeDescription.anthropic-llm:
LLM node using Anthropic API.
[Usage] Connect prompt input. Set model and system prompt in config.
nodeDescription.google-llm:
LLM node using Google AI API.
[Usage] Connect prompt input. Set model and system prompt in config.
nodeDescription.ollama-llm:
LLM node using local Ollama.
[Usage] Connect prompt input. Set model in config. *Requires Ollama running.
nodeDescription.coeiroink-tts:
TTS node using COEIROINK.
[Usage] Connect text to read. Select speaker in config. *Requires COEIROINK running.
nodeDescription.sbv2-tts:
TTS node using Style-Bert-VITS2.
[Usage] Connect text to read. Select model in config. *Requires API running.
nodeDescription.avatar-configuration:
VRM avatar configuration node.
[Usage] Set model URL and idle animation. Avatar displays on overlay.
nodeDescription.emotion-analyzer:
Emotion analysis node.
[Usage] Connect text to analyze. Outputs emotion and intensity.
nodeDescription.motion-trigger:
Manually trigger expressions and motions.
[Usage] Connect any input to trigger. Set expression/motion in config.
nodeDescription.lip-sync:
Lip-sync generation node.
[Usage] Connect audio input. Mouth values output in real-time.
nodeDescription.subtitle-display:
Subtitle display node.
[Usage] Connect text to display. Subtitles appear on overlay screen.
nodeDescription.audio-player:
Audio playback node.
[Usage] Connect audio data. Audio plays on overlay screen.
nodeDescription.obs-scene-switch:
OBS scene switch node.
[Usage] Connect trigger to execute. Set scene name in config. *Requires OBS WebSocket enabled.
nodeDescription.obs-source-toggle:
OBS source toggle node.
[Usage] Connect trigger. Set source name and action in config. *Requires OBS WebSocket enabled.
